title: Man told girls in Epping he wanted to 'have a baby', court hears
description: Hadush Kebatu, an asylum seeker staying at The Bell Hotel in Epping, denies five charges against him.

title: French PM Bayrou fights for survival as rivals refuse support in vote of confidence
description: Opposition parties say they will not back Prime Minister François Bayrou after a he called the vote over deep budget cuts.

title: Health and beauty chain Bodycare in race to avert collapse
description: Hundreds of jobs are at risk at the health and beauty retail chain, which employs about 1,500 people, as advisors race to avert its collapse as early as next week, Sky News learns.
content:
A health and beauty retailer founded on a Lancashire market stall more than half a century ago is facing collapse amid a race to find a rescue deal.
Sky News has learnt that Bodycare, which employs about 1,500 people, could fall into administration a... [2291 chars]

title: PlayStation CEO doesn't want first party studios to "play it safe" but "fail early and cheaply"
description: PlayStation CEO Hermen Hulst wants the company to mitigate expensive risks with its future games, following last year's…
content:
PlayStation CEO Hermen Hulst wants the company to mitigate expensive risks with its future games, following last year's high profile failure of live-service shooter Concord.
Speaking to Financial Times (via IGN), Hulst reflected on Concord's failure ... [1681 chars]

title: Migrant 'wanted to have baby' with girl, 14, and 'invited her back to asylum hotel'
description: Stuart Cowen, prosecuting at Chelmsford Magistrates' Court on Tuesday, said Hadush Gerberslasie Kebatu made 'inappropriate comments' to the girl and her female friend.
content: A resident of the Bell Hotel in Epping in Essex who had recently arrived in the UK attempted to kiss a 14-year-old girl who had offered him some pizza, a court heard. Stuart Cowen, prosecuting at Chelmsford Magistrates’ Court on Tuesday, said Hadush ... [1687 chars]
